txt.en: 'Greetings, [placeholder]. A hive-matron and her hive within the Gorge of Woe are altered by the corruption seeping across the land. They must be destroyed.'
There is no twist in this mission.
You have successfully slain the hive-matron and prevented the corrupted wasps from spreading in Urash Dâr! Return with the scout to Raphûz with this report.
Your mission is to travel to the Gorge of Woe and defeat the Hive-matron and her corrupted Urâshi wasps before they can spread throughout Urash Dâr.
'[placeholder], your task is to travel to the Gorge of Woe and defeat the hive-matron and her corrupted Urâshi wasps before they can spread throughout Urash Dâr.'
'I have heard of your success, [placeholder]. You have done well to stop the hive-matron and her swarm of corrupted wasps before they could cause more harm.'
Your mission is to travel to the Gorge of Woe and defeat the hive-matron and her corrupted Urâshi wasps before they can spread throughout Urash Dâr.\n\nSpeak with Raphûz to travel.
